reviewText: Dr. Greger. Synonymous with excellence in the health and nutrition field. His ability to "distill" the scientific information and studies in such a way that it becomes "edge of your seat" interesting is an art form.  Dr. Greger is an artist.

I have not bought this particular CD by Dr. Greger YET, but I feel compelled to tell of my experience of seeing him for the first time.  My rating above reflects CD's purchased by me in the same series.
I went to my first lecture by Dr. Michael Greger, MAINLY to appease a good friend of mine who is vegan...I am not; although I have been trying to change my diet to reflect healthier chioces.  Enough of that though.  I went, expecting to have one the most uninteresting and boring Sunday afternoons that I have ever had - sitting still for a couple of hours, listening to someone talk about health and food and diseases...
I was completely blown away...I could have listened to him talk for hours...I had questions!  I took notes!  I found out amazing facts about everyday foods that were so interesting!  He has a way of talking that makes you REMEMBER, and want to know more.  I ended up borrowing money from my friend so I could buy 6 of his CD's.  I took them home and listened to them right away.  Dr. Greger has a way of placing facts so that you want to know more, and a way of speaking so that you want to listen...he is definately not one of those monotone speakers, just the opposite.  I cannot wait for him to come back - and I will be the friend pestering the people who mean the most to me - to attend.

Dr. Greger's nutrition DVD 's are the latest and greatest in clinical nutrition. Each volume is as interesting and informative as the next. All proceeds are donated to charity which is a bonus !  Everything on the DVD is available for free on the website nutritionfacts.org. Dr. Greger also  speaks all around the country on the subjects on the DVD 's.
